q1: I really love the team AC Milan
q2: Do you like them because of their winning streak?
a2: No, I like them for the players they bring to the team in the past few years, their defense is really good.
q3: What kind of tournament does this team play?
a3: Well, in addition to their domestic league and cup, AC Milan qualified for the 2018/19 UEFA Europa  League.
a4: There were quite a few but the most expensive was Gonzalo Higuaín from Juventes.
q5: Do you think Higuaín was worth it?
a5: I think so however we won't know until the season starts
